translations: 同类的；血缘的；同族的；类似的，相关的

sentences.sentence: I recall many discussions with her on these and kindred topics.
sentences.translation: 我回想起多次同她就这些问题及类似话题进行的讨论。

sentences.sentence: We're only fifteen years old and kindred spirits.
sentences.translation: 我们才十五岁而且有着年轻的心态。

sentences.sentence: - and sad, because he missed his heavenly kindred!
sentences.translation: ——他也很伤心，因为他思念他在天国里的亲属！
